title: Pricing
meta-desc: Start free with all the features individual developers or small teams need to build internal applications.
page-desc: With the launch of ILLA Cloud Billing, you'll gain access to exclusive features such as Audit Logs and Public App. Our billing system is based on members with editing rights, including owner, admin, and editor roles. Once you subscribe, you can add unlimited viewers at no extra cost.

security.historic-7: Keep deployed versions & revert ( coming soon )
security.historic-30: Keep deployed versions & revert ( coming soon )
security.deployed: Self host and access to a deployed engineer

tips.plugins: Import plugins and make use of it within all the apps in your teams
tips.sql: Input natural language and generate SQL statement
tips.staging: Test your app against a staging environment
tips.app-public: Make the app public and anyone with the link can access it
tips.restore-data: Backup or restore history at any time you want
tips.deployed: Deployed engineers can help you onboard faster
tips.dedicated: Dedicated customer solutions engineer via Slack/email/phone

deployment.title: Flexible deployment
deployment.introduction: ILLA provides two ways to deploy. Developers can use the ILLA Cloud to quickly start building their apps on any device. We also provide ILLA CLI for free with better security to ensure data safety.

illa-cloud.title: ILLA Cloud
illa-cloud.des: Try one-click deployment and enjoy the easiest deployment experience

illa-CLI.title: ILLA CLI
illa-CLI.des: The fastest and easiest way to self-host ILLA

kubernetes.title: Kubernetes
kubernetes.des: Deploy ILLA into Kubernetes by using ILLA Helm chart

title.deployed-version: Keep deployed versions & revert ( coming soon )

desc.memberNum: All users in your team are your members. Editor means the members who can edit your apps, including editor, admin, owner. And Viewer means the members who can view the deployed apps(both the private apps and public apps).
desc.component: ILLA provides multiple components that you can use to build the front-end.
desc.data-source: ILLA provides 20+ resources which means the integration with APIs or databases. You can easily connect to your datasource by filling the GUI panel.
desc.public: Set the app as public. Users can access your app without signing in with ILLA account.
desc.sql-generation: Translate nature language into SQL statement with AI.
desc.watermark: Set whether to remove the app's watermark.
desc.audit-logs: Record the actions of your team members and view them at any time, including operations such as adding, deleting, modifying, and querying for team resources such as APPs, Resources, Members, and Drives.
desc.history: Automatically record the editing history of the app during your editing process and view and restore it at any time.
desc.storage: Use the storage space of ILLA Drive to store any of your files. The apps or integrated data you build in ILLA will not occupy any storage space.
desc.traffic: ILLA Drive is a CDN. You can use the traffic from ILLA Drive to download any file you have stored or distribute files such as images or videos on your website for your users to browse.
desc.ai-agent: Create your own AI agent or use AI agents created by other users to significantly increase your work efficiency.
desc.deployed-version: Save every deployed version and view or rollback at any time.
desc.theme: Create your own theme and replace your app's theme with just one click.
desc.environment: You can switch the Resource to production, test, or other custom environments with just one click, avoiding test data from affecting production data.
desc.colla: Colla can be used to run AI Agent, ILLA Drive Storage, ILLA Drive Traffic.

source-desc: Self-host with all features individual developers or small teams need to build internal applications. We provide ILLA CLI for free with better security to ensure data safety.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Any other questions? Feel free to <0>ask ILLA on Discord</0>

content.question: Who are the users that are charged for the product?
content.answer: Users with editing permissions (editor) are charged for the product.

content.question: What are the different types of editors?
content.answer: The different types of editors are owner, admin, and editor.

content.question: Are viewers charged for using the product?
content.answer: No, viewers are not charged for using the product.

content.question: How to invite a viewer?
content.answer: To invite a viewer, you need to upgrade the team to any of the Plus, Premium, or Enterprise plans and invite the user via email or link.

content.question: What services does ILLA Cloud provide?
content.answer: ILLA Builder, ILLA Drive and AI Agent.

content.question: What is ILLA Drive?
content.answer: ILLA Drive is a CDN (Content Delivery Network) that allows storing any files and distributing them to users through the company's websites or other products. Usage of storage and traffic is billed separately.

content.question: What is AI Agent?
content.answer: We provide an open-source AI Agent community with thousands of AI Agents provided by prompt experts and enthusiasts. Everyone can run or modify these AI Agents.

content.question: How is billing done for AI Agent usage?
content.answer: Billing for AI Agent usage is based on Colla, which is a billing concept within ILLA. Colla measures the resources consumed during the runtime of AI Agents.

tips.storage: Used to store any file in ILLA Drive. The apps you create in ILLA will not occupy any storage resources.
tips.traffic: Used to download any file from ILLA Drive, or to put your files such as pictures and videos on your website and distribute them to your users.
